The Fundamentals of Caring successfully provides an opportunity to think about caring to the audience. It seems that caring has two different meanings caregiving and consideration "; in this movie caring is depicted in both ways I think for me the lecturer in the opening scene teaches us about the former *, whereas Ben teaches us about the latter. To talk about my ex perience I have recently done community servicing at a day care center for the elderly and this movie made me more or less think back of my attitude there After listening to the lecture in the opening I was completely convinced Yet at the same time I asked myself is it really ?" and Ben proved that it isn t really so afterward Although there is no proper balance of caregiving and consideration ", this movie made me reflect upon myself at the day care center. Anyhow if you have a Netflix account it s definitely a must watch. --------------. * Quotes :. Caregiving is not just about feeding and clothing and cleaning It s also about understand ing how to navigate a complicated relationship between those who give care and those who are in need of it If you find yourself lost frustrated confused you can always come back to this helpful mnemonic device : ALOHA = Ask Listen Observe Help and Ask again The fundamentals of caregiving are to give care but not care too muc h. If you truly want a lasting career in caregiving you ll need to adhere to the c aregiver commandments Write these down They re important : I cannot take care of another unless I first take care of myself My needs are equal to the needs of the person to whom I am giving care All I can do is try my best and maintain a positive attitude .".
